Goal Representation:
Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Iron the shirt.', '2. Put the ironed shirt on the bed.']

behavior iron_shirt(shirt:item, iron:item, ironing_board:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(shirt, ironing_board)
        achieve plugged(iron)
        achieve is_on(iron)
        # These states ensure that the iron is plugged in and turned on
        # while the shirt is on the ironing board for ironing

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt)
        # Select a shirt
        
        bind iron: item where:
            is_iron(iron)
        # Select an iron

        bind ironing_board: item where:
            is_ironing_board(ironing_board)
        # Select an ironing board

        iron_shirt(shirt, iron, ironing_board)

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Iron the shirt.', '2. Place the ironed shirt on the bed.']

def has_plug(iron:item):
    # Determine whether the iron has a plug
    symbol has_plugged=exists plug:item: is_powersocket(plug) and plugged(iron)
    return has_plugged

behavior iron_shirt(ironing_board:item, iron:item, shirt:item):
    body:
        achieve close_char(char, ironing_board)
        # Approach the ironing board
        
        if has_plug(iron):
            # If the iron has a plug, then turn it on
            achieve is_on(iron)
        
        achieve_once inhand(shirt)
        # Hold the shirt with one hand to iron it
        
        # Actual ironing process can be assumed here
        
        achieve clean(shirt)
        # Ensure the shirt is ironed and clean

        if has_plug(iron):
            # Turn off the iron after use
            achieve is_off(iron)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind ironing_board: item where:
            is_ironing_board(ironing_board)
        # Select an ironing board
        
        bind iron: item where:
            is_iron(iron)
        # Select an iron
        
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt)
        # Select a shirt to iron

        iron_shirt(ironing_board, iron, shirt)

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Iron the shirt.', '2. Put the ironed shirt on the bed.']

behavior prepare_ironing_board(ironing_board:item):
    body:
        achieve open(ironing_board)
        # Open the ironing board for ironing

behavior plug_in_iron(iron:item, power_socket:item):
    body:
        achieve plugged(iron)
        # Plug the iron into the power socket

behavior turn_on_iron(iron:item):
    body:
        achieve is_on(iron)
        # Turn the iron on to start heating

behavior iron_clothes(clothes:item, ironing_board:item):
    body:
        achieve on(clothes, ironing_board)
        # Place the clothes on the ironing board for ironing
        
behavior turn_off_iron(iron:item):
    body:
        achieve is_off(iron)
        # Turn the iron off after ironing
        
behavior unplug_iron(iron:item):
    body:
        achieve unplugged(iron)
        # Unplug the iron after use

behavior close_ironing_board(ironing_board:item):
    body:
        achieve closed(ironing_board)
        # Close the ironing board after ironing

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt)
        # Select a shirt to iron
        bind iron: item where:
            is_iron(iron)
        # Select an iron
        bind power_socket: item where:
            is_powersocket(power_socket)
        # Select a power socket
        bind ironing_board: item where:
            is_ironing_board(ironing_board)
        # Select an ironing board

        prepare_ironing_board(ironing_board)
        plug_in_iron(iron, power_socket)
        turn_on_iron(iron)
        iron_clothes(shirt, ironing_board)
        turn_off_iron(iron)
        unplug_iron(iron)
        close_ironing_board(ironing_board)

Reset goals: The sub-goals are:

behavior iron_shirt(shirt:item, ironing_board:item, iron:item):
    body:
        achieve_once inhand(iron)
        achieve plugged(iron)
        achieve is_on(iron)
        achieve on(shirt, ironing_board)
        # Iron the shirt while its on the ironing board
        
behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt)
        # Identify the shirt to iron
        
        bind ironing_board: item where:
            is_ironing_board(ironing_board)
        # Identify the ironing board
        
        bind iron: item where:
            is_iron(iron)
        # Identify the iron
        
        iron_shirt(shirt, ironing_board, iron)
        
        achieve is_off(iron)
        # Ensure the iron is turned off after ironing
